filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Darkens the edge with an inner blur and adds a flexible glow
filter.inkscape:label: Dark And Glow

text.tspan: Chose the number of players (one or two).
If you select a two player game the game mode
since only that mode supports a two player game.
Two players play alternately after each life.
There are three different game modes.
- for every 10,000 points a new life is awarded
- the game always starts at level 1
- every 10,000 points a new life is awarded
- a game can be continued after the last live is lost
- the training level can be chosen (after once
